interpretation: With 5000 trials and 0 observed flips, we can rule out true flip rates >= 0.000599 (0.0599%) at 95% confidence, and >= 0.000921 (0.0921%) at 99% confidence. Even a true flip rate as low as 0.1% would produce zero flips only 6.7211e-03 of the time, giving us 99.33% power to detect it. The observation of 0 flips in 5000 trials provides strong evidence that permutation does not meaningfully alter model outputs.
